Say Goodbye to Paperwork Hassles

With ActiveDoc, signing documents is faster, easier, and completely free. Whether you’re handling business contracts, personal agreements or legal documents, our platform provides a seamless experience—from document creation to secure eSignatures.

01
100% Free & Easy to Use

No hidden fees, no complicated setup—just seamless, hassle-free document signing. Whether you're an individual or a business, enjoy the full power of eSigning without paying a dime.

02
Safe, Secure & Legally Binding

Your documents are protected with industry-leading encryption and comply with global eSignature laws (like eIDAS & ESIGN). Every signature is legally valid and comes with an audit trail.

03
Simple & Easy

No tech skills required! ActiveDoc is designed for everyone, with an intuitive interface that makes creating, signing, and managing documents effortless.

04
Exclusive Partner Offers

Enjoy special discounts, premium deals, and exclusive perks from our trusted partners! As an ActiveDoc user, you get instant access to money-saving offers. No extra steps—just great benefits, automatically included!

Transforming the Way You Sign & Manage Documents

At ActiveDoc, we believe signing documents should be effortless—quick, secure, and stress-free. That’s why we’ve created a 100% free platform designed for individuals and businesses to create, manage, track, and eSign documents online—all without the headaches of paperwork. Every signature is secure and legally binding, giving you peace of mind with every agreement.

ActiveDoc was created with a clear purpose: to revolutionize the way people manage and sign documents online.

We noticed businesses and individuals wasting time and money on slow, outdated, and complicated solutions—so we set out to build something better.

Combining innovative technology with an unmatched focus on simplicity, we’ve developed a powerful, secure, and completely free platform that empowers thousands of users to sign, send, and manage documents effortlessly every day.


No matter your industry, ActiveDoc ensures fast, secure, and hassle-free eSignatures. Get started today—for free!

Supercharge Your Productivity with ActiveDoc

Unique features that we provide.

01
Create Your Document

Create a fully customizable document or letter with flexible formatting, allowing you to add images, logos, and personalized elements effortlessly.

02
Autofill Documents Instantly

Save time with automatic data entry — information is seamlessly pulled from his account and applied to an unlimited number of documents and letters, eliminating repetitive manual input.

03
Send & Track with Ease

Add a tracking number, monitor your document’s progress and receive instant notifications upon delivery. Stay informed every step of the way!
